title: The Belgian Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. You must be 21 years old to enter this corner bar. Offers labeled vegan items on its menu including such as a burger, seitan tacos, BBQ wings, spring rolls, zucchini noodle pasta, vegan beignet, and a green salad. Mon-Thur full menu 11:30am-11pm, Fri til 1am. Saturday and Sunday brunch 11am-4pm. Sat full menu 4pm-1am, Sunday 4pm-11pm. Late night menu served at the bar. Previously located on 2047 Green St.
